ygData.subject: Re: EQ'Lizer Article
ygData.msgSnippet: A PGT isn t the best weapon you can have anyway, so it being a Lore item isn t that big of a deal, just get one for one hand and another weapon for your other
ygData.messageBody:
A PGT isn't the best weapon you can have anyway, so it being a Lore item
isn't that big of a deal, just get one for one hand and another weapon for
your other hand. How about a demon claw in your primary hand and the PGT in
your secondary?


> ----------
> From: Jim Ramsay[SMTP:wayfarer@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 7:00 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] EQ'Lizer Article
>
> I strongly recommend everyone read the article at this address:
> warriors_eq@onelist.com
>
> We have all been sold a bunch of lies regarding our class and I for one
> will never play this class again unless they repair it. Add to this the
> fact that Verant has made the better 1h slashing weapons in the game Lore
> items further decreases our power. Camping is a mage problem and the
> warriors get punished for it. Those of you dreaming of dual wielding
> Polished Granite Tomahawks can forget it, they are pending Lore items now.
>
> Hendall
> Dwarven Warrior Level 22, EC'I
>
